name: SelectionLasso
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  Abstract class for Class.SelectionPartLasso and Class.SelectionPartLasso.
description: |
  The SelectionLasso class is an abstract class of which the inheritors are able
  to be attached to an object of the Class.Humanoid class or the
  Class.BasePart class. They can also be attached to a point in the
  tridimensional space indicated by a Vector3 value.
